abstract: The game is over for Microsoft in the consumer market, except in gaming, predicts Mark Anderson, an influential industry analyst.
snippet: The game is over for Microsoft in the consumer market, except in gaming, predicts Mark Anderson, an influential industry analyst.
lead_paragraph: Mark Anderson is the writer behind the Strategic News Service, a predictive newsletter with a wide following among technology executives and venture capitalists, which he publishes from the island redoubt of Friday Harbor, Wash. And each December, he comes to New York, hosts a dinner and delivers a set of forecasts for the coming year.

headline.main: Microsoft Is Losing Fight for Consumers, Analyst Says
